From: (USANYS) 
[Contractor]" 
To: 
Subject: RE: Time sensitive review of pending productions 
Date: Wed, 24 Nov 2021 20:57:28 +0000 
Attachments: 2021.11.24_U.S._v_Maxwell_Non-Testifying_Witness_Material_IndexiDefense).pdf; 
2021.11.24_Maxwell_Discovery_Letter.pdf; 
2021.11.24_U.S._v_Maxwell_3500_IndexiDefense).pdf; 
2021.11.24_Maxwell 3500 Cover Letter.pdf 
Cover letters and indices for the 3500 and Rule 16 productions are attached. The hard drive and password have been sent 
via FedEx with the following tracking numbers: 8166 1408 9156 (drive) and 8166 1408 9145 (pw). 
The production is uploaded to USAfx and is ready to share with defense counsel when you email out. 
Thanks, 
From: 
Sent: Wednesday, November 24, 2021 3:18 PM 
To: (USANYS) [Contractor] 
(USANYS) 
Subject: RE: Time sensitive review of pending productions 
and I sorted out out. All set. 
From• 
Sent: Wednesday, November 24, 2021 3:10 PM 
To: (USANYS) [Contractor] 
4 
(USANYS)
Subject: RE: Time sensitive review of pending productions 
Hi all, 
I've reviewed all of the productions and the two cover letters. So everything is reviewed and ready to go except the index 
— I just got a  time sensitive call. Can someone else look at that? 
From: (USANYS) [Contractor] a. 
Sent: Wednesday, November 24, 2021 2:59 PM 
To: 
(USANYS) 
Subject: Time sensitive review of pending productions 
Hi all, 
If you want to get a production out today (sent on a drive via FedEx to GM), we will need to have it reviewed and ready for 
me to load by 3:20pm latest (FedEx last pick up is 4pm today). 
EFTA00031109

The TW 3500 production is here: Msa.doj.gov\cloud NYS\StAndrewASharecRUSvEpstein-2018R01618MTrial \ 3500 1. 
Testifying\ Production 11 
NTW 3500 production is here: Msa.doj.gov\cloud \ NYS\ StAndrewASharecaUSvEpstein-2018R01618UTrial \ 3500 2. Non-
Testifying \ 
Production 11 
Rule 16 production is here: Msa.doj.gov \cloud \ NYS \StAndrews \Shared \ USvEpstein-2018R01618Wiscovery\GM \ 41 
Thirty-Second Production (2021-11-n) 
Cover letters for both and 3500 indices (excel version) are attached. Please let me know as soon as you can if there are 
any changes you want to make. 
Thanks, 
Paralegal Specialist 
U.S. Attorney's Office 
SDNY 
1 Saint Andrew's Plaza 
New York, NY 10007 
Office:
